titleStmt.title: Work for a cooper being an answer to a libel, written by Thomas Wynne the cooper, the ale-man, the quack, and the speaking-Quaker : with a brief account how that dissembling people differ at this day from what at first they were / by one who abundantly pities their ignorance and folly.
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, fl. 1679-1710.

titleStmt.title: Work for a cooper being an answer to a libel, written by Thomas Wynne the cooper, the ale-man, the quack, and the speaking-Quaker : with a brief account how that dissembling people differ at this day from what at first they were / by one who abundantly pities their ignorance and folly.
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, fl. 1679-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. C. for S. C. ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by William Jones of North Wales. Cf. Halkett and Laing (2nd ed.)
